title: Fix PHPStan return type specification errors
description: Fix ~10 PHPStan errors for methods with unspecified callable return types

title: Fix PHPStan null safety issues in packages/auxiliary/src/Beads/
description:
Multiple null safety and type checking issues in auxiliary package Beads code:

Files affected:
- UpdateAction.php:102 - Expression on left side of ?? is not nullable
- TbdClock.php:24 - Strict comparison using === between DateTimeImmutable and false 
- DependencyService.php:66 - Only booleans allowed in &&, bool|null given

These are strict PHPStan level 8 violations that need proper null handling and type guards.

title: Fix example list printout layout to restore padded/aligned columns
description:
The example list output has lost its nice column formatting. Previously had padded, aligned columns with consistent spacing between example name, status, and timing. Current output shows unaligned text with inconsistent spacing making it harder to read.

EXPECTED (better format):
[1]   Basic                          > running ... >    OK    (  1.25 sec )
[2]   BasicConstructor               > running ... >    OK    (  1.18 sec )

ACTUAL (worse format):  
(1/196) basics/Basic ... OK (1.12s)
(2/196) basics/BasicConstructor ... OK (1.22s)

Need to restore proper column alignment and padding for readability.

title: Comprehensive PHPStan level 8 compliance project
description:
Master tracking issue for achieving PHPStan level 8 compliance across all packages.

âœ… COMPLETED PHASES:

2. **Console Command Issues** (12+ errors): Fixed properties, JSON encoding, unused dependencies
3. **HTTP Client Issues** (13+ errors): Added getters, fixed impossible comparisons, removed dead code
4. **Code Duplication Bug** (1 critical): Fixed resolveToolKey() method
5. **Test Class Conflicts** (3+ errors): Renamed conflicting TestEvent classes
6. **Laravel Model Issues** (6+ errors): Added type annotations for properties
7. **Method Signature Issues** (3+ errors): Added proper callable return type signatures
8. **Framework Integration** (140+ errors): Fixed Laravel/Illuminate integration issues

âœ… Add proper type annotations

title: Fix PHPStan framework integration issues in packages/logging
description:
Multiple framework integration issues in logging package causing PHPStan errors:

Laravel Integration Issues:
- Missing config(), config_path(), storage_path() functions
- References to undefined Illuminate classes

Symfony Integration Issues:  
- Missing Symfony Security classes (TokenStorageInterface)
- Undefined container and service classes

Missing Event Classes:
- Cognesy\Instructor\Events\* classes not found
- Cognesy\HttpClient\Events\* classes not found

Files affected:
- Factories/LaravelLoggingFactory.php
- Factories/SymfonyLoggingFactory.php
- Integrations/Laravel/InstructorLoggingServiceProvider.php
- Integrations/Laravel/config/instructor-logging.php
- Filters/EventHierarchyFilter.php

These are optional dependencies that should be conditionally handled.

title: Fix UndefinedMethod errors in ExtHttpPool
description: Method HttpRequestList::chunk and HttpResponseList::from don't exist in ExtHttpPool.php

title: Fix PHPStan Laravel/Illuminate integration errors
description: Fix ~80 PHPStan errors related to missing Laravel/Illuminate classes and functions in Beads migrations and service providers

title: Fix InvalidCast error in ExtHttpResponseAdapter
description: Cannot cast http\Header to int for Content-Length header

title: Fix InvalidNamedArgument errors in ExtHttpResponseAdapter
description: Parameters chunk, bytesReceived, totalBytes don't exist on HttpResponseChunkReceived::__construct

title: Fix PHPStan Laravel migration issues in packages/auxiliary
description:
Laravel Eloquent migration file has multiple PHPStan errors due to missing Illuminate classes:

File: packages/auxiliary/src/Beads/Eloquent/Migrations/2025_12_02_000001_create_beads_issues_table.php

Issues:
- Anonymous class extends unknown class Illuminate\Database\Migrations\Migration
- Parameter $table has invalid type Illuminate\Database\Schema\Blueprint
- Multiple method calls on unknown Blueprint class (id, string, text, tinyInteger, etc.)

This is expected when Laravel is not loaded but PHPStan should handle optional dependencies gracefully.

title: Fix event namespaces in all logging examples
Make logging examples display actual log output
description: Examples should show logging messages so users can see what the pipeline does

title: Fix InvalidReturnType errors in ExtHttpPool
description: Return type doesn't match declared type for processBatch method

title: Update A02 examples with correct event namespaces
Fix PHPStan code quality issues in packages/polyglot
description:
Multiple code quality issues detected by PHPStan in polyglot package:

1. Unused Method (packages/polyglot/src/Inference/Data/PartialInferenceResponse.php:303):
   - Method resolveToolKey() is unused and should be removed or marked with @internal

2. Unnecessary Type Casting (packages/polyglot/src/Inference/Data/Usage.php:68-72):
   - Multiple instances of casting to int something that's already int
   - Redundant (int) casts should be removed for cleaner code

These are quality improvements that don't affect functionality but improve code maintainability.

title: Fix PHPStan missing event class errors
description: Fix ~30 PHPStan errors for missing HttpClient and Instructor event classes that should exist but are not being found by autoloader

title: Fix InvalidArgument error in ExtHttpPool NetworkException
description: Wrong argument type passed to NetworkException::__construct - expects HttpResponse|null but Throwable provided

title: Check correct event namespaces in codebase
description: Find all actual event class namespaces for StructuredOutput, Inference, and Embeddings

title: Update B02 examples with correct event namespaces
